item.description:
Check out the Playboy Golf Model Search Party at Scoreboard on Thursday, August 9 from 7pm to 11pm including a VIP Event in the Crowne Plaza ballroom hosted by Miss April 2010, Amy Andrews.

Private signings, photos, meet and greet with Amy Andrews, and complimentary appetizers from 7:30pm to 8:30pm.

Live entertainment by the Herland Brothers at 7:30pm.

Playboy Golf will be searching for ladies to host the 2012 Playboy Scramble. There will be a Live PhotoShoot and testing in the Grand Ballroom.

After Party with the Lisa Love Experience in the Scoreboard and back patio which is open to the public from 9pm to 12pm with bar and Rolling Stogies.

Scoreboard has been one of our venues for watching Patriots, Red Sox, Bruins and Celtics games over the past several years.

If you have never been to Scoreboard, it is located at 15 Middlesex Canal Park next to the Holiday Inn and Showcase Cinema off Route 128 in Woburn. Scoreboard has over 30 High Definition and Plasma TVs ranging in size from 50 to 92 inches. Parking is free. More info at http://www.tpsscoreboard.com.

Everyone is responsible for their own food and drinks. PLEASE MAINTAIN YOUR OWN TAB OR PAY AS YOU ORDER AND TIP YOUR SERVERS.  

Space is limited.

We hope to see you there!

The Red Sox Natives team.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask Lauren or the Scoreboard hostess to direct you to other Red Sox Natives or request a table.
item.name: Playboy Golf Model Search Party at Scoreboard
